content.raw:
The auth and portal (and keys) servers are expected to be up and running all the time and probably don't need to monitor them that often. So we can increase the intervals to something like 2 minutes

Later we'll reuse this widget in the SRC kiosk to ping cloudsim-sim servers, 30 seconds will be a good interval. Note, it'll be nice that once we detect that the cloudsim-sim server is up and running, we increase the interval to minutes. This is not urgent.
content.html:
The auth and portal (and keys) servers are expected to be up and running all the time and probably don't need to monitor them that often. So we can increase the intervals to something like 2 minutes

Later we'll reuse this widget in the SRC kiosk to ping cloudsim-sim servers, 30 seconds will be a good interval. Note, it'll be nice that once we detect that the cloudsim-sim server is up and running, we increase the interval to minutes. This is not urgent.
